title: 管理员弄的领地普通玩家怎么会这样
author: CuizhuH

replies.author: ProperSAMA
replies.txt_content:
tp权限开启/res set tp t
移动权限开启/res set move t
以上指令需要站在领地里使用

replies.author: xujh
replies.txt_content: 没有给普通玩家基本权限

replies.author: CuizhuH
xujh
replies.txt_content:
CuizhuH 发表于 2015-1-6 18:35
怎么给
看对应插件的权限表给
